tweet: Mummy, is Gareth Southgate related to Stacey Solomon from X-Factor?
On my telly, it looks like Bes from the Happy Mondays is beating Mani from Primal Scream 1-0.
Text from daddy: Son, on my way home, not even on the bloody bench. I'll pick us up a bacon double cheese. Don't worry, I'll go large. Dad.
Text from daddy: Besiktas fans gone very quiet. They've just heard that Nani isn't playing. Ben's in goal - Edwin & Tomas blaming each other
Text from daddy: Tomas has found Edwin's fake turd and has snapped his lucky windmill. Ben Foster is shaking his head saying "And I'm No 3".
